subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Jets won their preseason finale by driving from their 18-yard line to Philadelphia’s 17 with three seconds to play, setting up Mike Nugent’s 35-yard field goal as time expired.
snippet: The Jets won their preseason finale by driving from their 18-yard line to Philadelphia’s 17 with three seconds to play, setting up Mike Nugent’s 35-yard field goal as time expired.
